meta.title: Learn Claude Code
meta.description: Build a nano Claude Code-like agent from 0 to 1, one mechanism at a time

home.hero_subtitle: Build a nano Claude Code-like agent from 0 to 1, one mechanism at a time
home.core_pattern_desc: Every AI coding agent shares the same loop: call the model, execute tools, feed results back. Production systems add policy, permissions, and lifecycle layers on top.
home.learning_path_desc: 12 progressive sessions, from a simple loop to isolated autonomous execution
home.layers_desc: Five orthogonal concerns that compose into a complete agent
home.message_flow_desc: Watch the messages array grow as the agent loop executes

timeline.title: Learning Path
timeline.subtitle: s01 to s12: Progressive Agent Design

layers.title: Architectural Layers
layers.subtitle: Five orthogonal concerns that compose into a complete agent
layers.tools: What the agent CAN do. The foundation: tools give the model capabilities to interact with the world.
layers.planning: How work is organized. From simple todo lists to dependency-aware task boards shared across agents.
layers.memory: Keeping context within limits. Compression strategies that let agents work infinitely without losing coherence.
layers.concurrency: Non-blocking execution. Background threads and notification buses for parallel work.
layers.collaboration: Multi-agent coordination. Teams, messaging, and autonomous teammates that think for themselves.

compare.subtitle: See what changed between any two versions
